title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui, the result is unexpected. The package 'ui' is copied to the destination.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' operation, the package 'ui' is included in the destination.
EB: After performing the 'copy package' operation, the package 'ui' should not be included in the destination.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project. 2. Open the Package viewer. 3. Select a package in project A. 4. Right-click to open the context menu. 5. Choose the 'copy' option.
